titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 11805 Chimney Rock Road in Houston, Texas, as the "Lee P. Brown Post Office Building".
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 11805 Chimney Rock Road in Houston, Texas, as the "Lee P. Brown Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 11805 Chimney Rock Road in Houston, Texas, as the Lee P. Brown Post Office Building.
